labels.shortDescription: Message displayed in Payload field when PE payload logging is disabled
labels.value: Payload logging disabled for active configuration. Related Platform Event Log Fields are still generated.

labels.shortDescription: Exception message thrown when multiple configurations are active for this PE
labels.value: Multiple Platform Event Log Configuration metadata records are active for {0}

labels.shortDescription: Exception message thrown when field in log list does not exist on PE
Error message logged for JSON parsing error
labels.value: Could not parse JSON for this field. Review Payload on Platform Event Log.

labels.shortDescription: Exception message thrown when no configurations exist for this PE
labels.value: No Platform Event Log Configuration metadata record exists for {0}
